d315121bd826bfef069338cc7cd0251f.target: Before it expires, you can decide not to renew the permit for subsidiary protection but to request conversion to a residence permit for self-employment or employed work if you work regularly, to a permit for study if you are enrolled in a training course or university, or to an EU residence permit for long-term residents ("Card"), after five years of residence in Italy.
